game.name: Eternal Hope
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Eternal Hope은 자신이 사랑하는 사람의 영혼을 찾기 위해 떠난 티비라는 소년의 사랑과 희망의 여정을 함께하는 퍼즐 플랫포머 게임입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Eternal Hope is a puzzle platformer game that follows the story of Ti’bi – a boy who must embark on a journey of love and hope to find his beloved’s soul.
